user.title: Add Octo Bed
user.description: Search for nearby beds (via Bluetooth proxy) or enter details manually.

data.next_step: How do you want to add your bed?

scan.title: Search for beds
scan.description: Select a device (MAC shown first to differentiate beds). Found {count} device(s).

manual.title: Octo Bed details
manual.description: Enter remote name (e.g. RC2) and the bed's BLE MAC address. We'll test the connection with your PIN before adding. Optionally give the device a name for the overview.

confirm_bluetooth.title: Set PIN for bed
confirm_bluetooth.description: Set PIN for this bed. We'll test the connection before adding. MAC: {mac} Optionally give the device a name (e.g. Living room bed).

calibrate.title: Calibration
calibrate.description: Device added. Choose an action below (buttons). Use the **bed's** BLE MAC (not the remote RC2) when using a Bluetooth proxy. {status}

error.invalid_mac: MAC must be exactly 12 hex characters (e.g. AA:BB:CC:DD:EE:FF)
error.mac_required: Enter the bed's BLE MAC address (12 hex characters) to verify the PIN before adding.
error.invalid_pin: Wrong PIN or could not connect. Check the PIN and try again. Use the bed base BLE MAC, not the remote (RC2).
error.no_devices_found: No Octo Bed remotes found. Ensure remotes are on and in range of your Bluetooth proxy.

abort.calibration_complete: Setup complete. You can calibrate the bed anytime from the device.
